title: I t̶r̶i̶e̶d̶ ̶t̶o̶ beat Elden Ring Without Dying..

comments.comment: Felix actually enjoying a game and getting into it. The brofist at the end. The season finale before he moves and takes another step in life?? The meaning is setting a goal that seems impossible and achieving it. This is my favorite video in a minute fam.
Wow I'm so glad that my video was helpful . Congrats !
What I love about felix is when he actually willing to do something thoroughly, he will pull it off. True gamer.
It’s a tradition to watch this video every once in a while… it’s a comfort video.
this was a huge reminder for me that pewds is actually a high level gamer and knows what hes doing. His humor makes him seem like a dad gamer but he’s actually insane
I can tell that Pewds genuinely loves this game! This is such a well edited video!
Zero deaths has always been one of my favorite inside jokes in the community, and to see you actually achieve it is phenomenal. Congrats Felix! Glad I could be a part of this journey.

Damn, i cant believe it took me 11 months after to finally watch this. Its so nostalgic this analytic/serious/hardworking/invested side of him is, it reminded me of his earlier years. But until now he still is so dedicated and i really respect him as a person, literally grew up 'with' him. Bro forever pewds
this is by far, the best gaming video pewds has ever made, everything is perfect, the order of the events, the voice-over, the editing. Awesome video, keep up the good work.
I've never played Elder Ring but this video held my interest way more than I expected it to, I was so invested in the Zero Deaths story
Blows my mind how Pewds is successful, a family man, and a true 0 death Elden Lord all at the same time.
Just started playing Elden Ring and now I can appreciate and understand the video much more. Pewds is a real gamer god.

So refreshing to see content like this come from Pewds, feels like it's been years.

PewDiePie was pretty much done with video games and was semi-retired but Elden Ring caused him to make one of the biggest videos he's made in a long time.

Out of all games there are as of recent, Elden Ring rekindled Pewds love for gaming content creation and he took a week making this one video. Just shows how good of a game it is. Deny it all you want but it's just the goat.
This really felt like old school pewds, he just going full on on a game, amazing video pewds
Thank you very much for the shoutout, glad one of my past speedrun routes was able to help you with this challenge :)
How come I've never seen this video before? I thought it was just a longplay of the Pewd's playtrough but instead it's one of the most insightful wholesome videos about Elden Ring there is! OMG

I haven't seen one of Pewds' videos edited this well in forever, it's beautiful. It's sarcastic, witty, analytical, and just altogether an awesome watch. While I'm fine with his more chill videos that he's been doing lately, I love this style of him actually putting effort into it and challenging himself.

No wonder his uploads are getting more scarce. He's expending his time and efforts making masterpieces. I'm all for it. I didn't know he still had it in him to make brilliant gameplay videos like this. With such a compelling introduction.
This is the pewds that I thought he’d turn into after all of his gaming early on in his channel. This right here gives me joy

23:40 “I wonder why people always kill him but apparently he steals your runes”

Know how when you die your runes are dropped and you can pick them back up? Gustoc takes a percentage of those dropped runes every time you die within the castle before killing godrick so when you pick them back up that percentage is missing. When you take the secret passage he’s also the one who locks you in the room with the knight guy and as a cool Easter egg you can actually see him tailing you from the shadows when exploring certain areas of the castle. He is important for a certain optional quest line but if you’ve already done it or don’t care it’s really better to just kill him. If you kill him and then take the secret passage you won’t get locked in with the knight
Damn dude, even with mimic I think it would take me approximately 3 lifetimes to complete a no death run... you really are a gamer god.

Expected this to be another joke about zero deaths, but I was immediately excited and invested when I realised you were seriously considering a deathless run. This was such a good video ; your best in years. I appreciate the effort. Must have felt amazing! Congrats.
Genuinely one of the most impressive Elden ring videos I've seen, even though there's lots of insane people that play this game, seeing Felix do it was incredibly satisfying.

I had previously commented about you cheesing bosses whilst watching this video. Tbh, now I've watched this in it's entirety, it honestly doesn't matter. It's the determination and the fun you had in the process and the most incredible feeling you must have had at the end of the game. You say its meaningless, yet you have 11 million views on this video, showing how much it actually means to a whole community of people. It is an incredible feat and shouldn't be undervalued. Well done bro. I hope to one day reach this same level of skill and patience.
It’s really impressive how Pewds managed to do ANOTHER zero deaths Elden Ring play through. I found the first play through to be  enough but this one here was a statement.

Congrats Pewds! That's a seriously impressive achievement!

Side note: I really like this form of video, a step by step walkthrough of how you completed a challenge. I watch a bunch of channels that do similar content and it's great to see you doing it too!

Love this video, so interested in what he's doing, the commentary isn't forced, he's genuine about his failings, how long it took, how proud he is of accomplishing this, because if its something you care about, then it matters, video game or not. Pewdiepie always making his fabs feel great :)

around the 12 minute mark he mentioned playing the dark because people would question if it were his footage or not... thats insane... good accounting pewds this is one of my fav pewd vids if seen in a long time

Watched this whole thing like a movie, great job Pewds. Last bosses were so intense I felt like I was on this journey with you the whole time. Was super hyped and impressed when you beat them all. Congrats, amazing video

This sounds cheesy, but seeing you making videos you‘re passionate about and not caring that much about upload consistency is so beautiful to see. I‘ve basically grown up watching your videos since the weird Steam games / Happy Wheels / Fridays w PewDiePie and it‘s been such a journey. Whenever I‘ve had a tough day, I would watch one of your videos and actually felt better, until this day. I turned 23 last week and I don‘t have any feeling of ever „outgrowing“ you, because unlike other „YouTubers“, you care about the thing you‘re doing and it feels like you and your audience (us) are maturing together, facing life‘s challenges - albeit in very different ways - and overcoming them. Thank you for staying true to yourself and putting smiles on our faces, even when it‘s not always easy for you.
The effort put into this video is insane. The editing is FIRE. Keep up Pewds.
Videos like this are special. To watch Pewds play and talk about a game he is obviously very passionate about is special. Great video!

As someone that grew up watching my close friends play games and explain the gameplay as I watched, this hits that sweet spot. I’m not much of a gamer anymore but the way pewds explains this is rad. Thanks for taking all the effort. The joy in playing the game is cool to watch.
This video is truly one of his all-time greatest. Everything about it: the gameplay, the narrating, the jokes in between. This is why we love this man.
U know its a good game when he puts this much effort into it.

It's 2025 and I just starting playing Elden Ring, I rememberd Felix did this video years ago, so I'm back to watch it to destroy my weak noob mentality. I still stand by this being the best video Pewds ever made
Such a good run, gah damn
Crazy gaming skills. Mad respects.

Most videos he made recently are laid back and chill but this one is so intense and you can tell there are lots of efforts spent to make us hooked from the start to the end of the video. Feel like I was watching a speedrun challenge documentary
well damn, you actually did it, i put off watching this cause i thought it would just be a comp of your regular playthrough, but this? this is amazing. Well done Pewds.
my heart honestly was so happy watching this video. you can just hear how honest and open pewds is and he seems really passionate in this. I was so entertained the whole time
The amount of dedication is respectable. Elden Ring has truly reignited what I missed about video games and the passion the developers have put into it is admirable.

Pewds I'm mad impressed by your run here man. Anyone who complains about your strats doesnt know the skill and planning that goes into this kind of run. Nor would they be able to do it themselves. Congrats Bro. You are the true Elden"Zero Deaths"Lord.

35:32 
This sentence is what makes someone a souls player. ong.
You've grown so much as a gamer! From screaming at barrels to zero deaths on Elden Ring. Bravo pewds.

Absolutely fucking sick, from the story telling to the final outcome and premise... this was an amazing video and also legendary to see you actually zero death this game. So great to actually see, keep up the hype pewds
I dont say this a lot, but I want to praise for pew's dedication on a REAL zero death run. Yes, he cheeses  a bit here and there, but this is a respectable run and he did it.
Now do the DLC

Pewds, we’re so proud of you for this type of content. Also, Elden Ring is an absolute masterpiece that brought a lot of us back to gaming. 
Glad it’s done the same for you!  welcome back to gaming
You know he worked really hard on this one. Most of his videos lately have been a bit more chill and then he releases this  Beauty of a video. Keep it up pewds
He did his old intro he even gave us a brofist. This definitely felt old school . Congratulations on finally moving!
Cheese or no, this run is still mad impressive. Clearly a lot of time went into it. Great run.
As someone who has never played, it’s absolutely mesmerizing how much you know about this game. Great vid!

This felt like such a different channel I was watching compared to the usual old videos I used to watch

I loved it. It actually felt like a genuine and insightful look on what you did. Amazing video.
This is actually awesome. Can't believe a meme became true and you crushed one of the hardest games out there, truly with ZERO DEATHS.
34:09 the bridge incident reference did not go unnoticed

I love how elden ring has pushed so many content creators to make this more in depth descriptive type of content, this might be one of my favourite pewds vid ever and i’ve never been a huge fan of the soles games. Absolute adored this!
This is the most refreshing Video Felix has done in a long time. Watched the whole thing and really fell in love with his narration and the fact, that he seems so genuine and not elitist.
wow, absolutely incredible. The fact he was ACTUALLY able to beat this game without dying a single time makes him an elite gamer
thats pretty nostalgic, i probably like this side of pewds the most tbh
This video is phenomenal, for some reason this was so intriguing and well made. A true video from a veteran YouTuber
This is literally the best video Felix has posted in a while! The editing and his commentary are just perfect

This video is just PERFECT. I loved every single second of it. So much emotions going on, the achievement, the road to gain it, the voice over. It was a very long time I didn't brofisted the screen but this time it was needed. Thank you. Always love when you play games for HOW you play games but this time I really feel proud of you and to be a bro more than ever! <3
Pewds Freudian slip at 1:33
He sounds so happy and proud of himself throughout the entire video. Congrats Pewds
Massive respect to felix for actually doing this then narrating it for another 50 mins! I’ll definitely be purchasing a PDP squiddy for sure to go along with the ghost keyboard and mouse
Congrats Pewds you are so amazing doing this challenge
I always come back every 3 days to watch the whole thing over and over again. Love his timeless humor and personality here 🫶

Omg This type of gaming commentary video gave me so much nostalgia. I never thought he would do this type of vides because he was semi-retired and all but Elden Ring rekindled his spirit and made him put out this masterpiece of a video that he'd made in a while. Thanks pewds and good luck moving!
I almost smashed my screen doing that brofist at the end. Kudos for beating the game no deaths and I'm thrilled to see you finally being on the move to Japan ️

wow i havent seen pewds in a bit and watching now is strange. it might just be the context of the video, but he sounds more calm, serious and more obvious, its a very factual video. something i didnt expect to see here. i enjoyed the vid immensely, love the newer content

I have never in my life been so invested watching a zero deaths gameplay.
Just knowing the fact that pweds knows what's up with the game and pulling up some real fights and some cheese strat, respect is all I can offer.

Wow, didn't even know Pewds had this analytical, strategical gamer side to him! I actually think this is the best video in years and thoroughly liked the explanation and planning for the run before executing. Good stuff.
As you can see in the comments here I think I speak for everyone when I say we'd love more videos like this. This is the oldschool Pewds who many of us started watching years and years ago.

I thought i won't like this but turns out i loved it. Great storytelling, had me hooked 
And wow he gave shoutouts to smaller channels. He didn't have to do that but he did. Love pewds for life
I love how you went into little details about everything you did honestly this was an awesome video. Congrats on the achievement!!
This is the best pewediepie video ever made, he looks so intreseted and he has put a lot of work into it.
its funny that pewds doesnt get taken as a "serious" gamer but when he wnats to he actually is that guy

I wouldn't call it meaningless, you've learned that through perseverance and struggle you are able to achieve massive feats goals. To anyone reading this, I hope everything is going well, if not u just have to struggle to see it end and feel sweet taste of victory over every obstacle you went over so far. NEVER GIVE UP SKELETON
ZERO DEATHS. Not once in this hour long video was I not entertained, one of my favorite videos from you. Brofist
dude this video is amazing. PEWDS BRINGING IT!
The bro fist at the end after not catching up for the past two years made me actually shed a tear. You’re amazing man!! Thanks

Came back after watching the  og upload a year ago. Still slaps just as hard seeing you feel so accomplished. And now for the challenge of having a kid. The perciverence you learned here will pay off really soon. Good luck Pewds, thanks for the ride!
I was literally holding my breath as you fought the Elden Beast. Super freaking impressive. I haven't watched Pewd's content in years and this was a phenomenal video to come back to
This was such a joy to watch. 50 minutes went by like nothing. Super good editing, wonderful narration. It's like a movie.

the reward for the time and effort it takes to master the "Souls games" have always been my favorite. Its why I fell in love with the series and do what i do.
This video perfectly captures what that feeling is like and I hope many others start to see it the same way!
Not a bridge reference in the beginning with that sunny in philly
10:56 has so much more nostalgia behind it than I feel like it should  hearing pewds go full Swedish was great!
Can I be honest? I did NOT expect a serious video T_T Huge respect Pewds, I can feel your motivation and how much of yourself you gave to archieve this ! Congratz

I was going to say "You don't have to do it Pewds, we all understand the meme. The people who were being shitty about it most likely just want to get something out of your fame." But watching until the end of this video I understood this is also something you wanted to do yourself, by all means. So I'm really glad that you enjoyed it and we are proud of you. ZERO DEATH
The biggest "fuck you" to whoever made fun of him not achieving zero deaths.
Loved this so much, with your commentary and all. 1 hour went by and felt like 15 minutes. Both intense and relaxing at the same time.

This has to be one of my favorite videos you've ever made, it's really cool to see the amount of thought you've put into the game and the fact that you can explain it out and make it seem so easy to understand. You truly a dying breed, in the gaming world and I respect getting to watch every moment.

Man it's so satisfying to see your progress and listening to your commentary while doing your deathless run.

Great job Pewds!
Pews is such a fuckin gamer. Grew up watching him. 24 now, and feel like he’s a homie lmao your content is epic as ever
This gameplay is a masterpiece! Love how Felix discuss everything about his 0 deaths gameplay. One of the best video!

Brings a little tear into my eyes and all of us who watched him suffer for so long on live streams. Even if you are not a gamer or you see just this vid, not streams, you can clearly see and appreciate the determination, resilience and hard work my man with huge P P has put into it. What a legend you are Felix !!!
Listening to him explain how he did this, sounds like showing my mom how I beat Eldin Ring and explaining every part
